Title: Prohibits a court from bifurcating certain primary elections
Summary: Prohibits a court from bifurcating the primary elections for members of the state and county committees and assembly district leaders and associate district leaders and all other party positions to be elected and all nominations for public office required to be made at a primary election in such year, except presidential primaries.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting a court from bifurcating certain primary elections
